overview.en: The KKK chain is based on the loT + 5G communication technology + the profitable operating system of the physical mining machine under the 5G IoT communication technology, a high-efficiency, low-latency, low-cost platform.
overview.zh: 矿场链是基于5G 物联网通信技术之下的loT+5G通讯技术+实体矿机的收益型操作系统，一个高效率、低时延、低成本的平台。
